short_summary: Contaminated Sites Marine Sediment Remediation Services
description: The required services include: program management; investigations and modelling; planning; remediation construction management; and other related environmental services.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Contaminated Sites Marine Sediment Remediation Services

### Tender Details
| Feature | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4207917020 |
| Tender Title (English) | EZ897-231336, Contaminated Sites Marine Sediment Services |
| Tender Title (French) | EZ897-231336, Services liés aux sites de sédiments marins contaminés |
| Tender Status | Expiré |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-10-30T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2023-10-25 |
| UNSPSC Code | 77000000 |
| UNSPSC Description (English) | Environmental Services |
| UNSPSC Description (French) | Services de l'environnement |

### Important Dates
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 30, 2023, at 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: October 25, 2023
- **Publication Date**: September 11, 2023

### Contract Detail
The contracts are expected to commence immediately after the contract award and are expected to last until January 1, 2024.

### Region of Delivery
The contracts will be delivered in various regions, including Indigenous Lands in British Columbia and Yukon.

### Notice Type
The tender notice type is Request for Proposal.

### Competitive Process
This contract will be awarded through a competitive process with open bidding, with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price determining the winner.

### Goods and Services Table
| Feature | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Category | SRV |
| Trade Agreements | Various, including Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) |

### Contact Detail
Contractor: Katie Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
Phone Number: None
Email Address: katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
